message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I believe it's worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $18000 for it. I think it's a fair price considering the value you're offering.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $19500. I believe this price is still a great value for the unique features and benefits this product provides.
